GetProfile.summary: Returns profile information for the current user.

UpdateProfile.summary: Updates profile information for the current user and returns the updated profile.

GetSettings.summary: Returns settings for the given user.

UpdateSettings.summary: Updates settings for the given user and returns the updated settings.

GetFitnessActivityFeed.summary: Returns fitness (cardio) activities for the given user.

GetStrengthTrainingActivityFeed.summary: Returns strength activities for the given user.

post_to_facebook.description: True to post this activity to Facebook, false to prevent posting (optional; if not specified, the user's default preference is used)

post_to_twitter.description: True to post this activity to Twitter, false to prevent posting (optional; if not specified, the user's default preference is used)

GetBackgroundActivitySetFeed.summary: Returns background activities for the given user.

post_to_twitter.description: Whether to post these measurements to Twitter (optional; if omitted, the user's default setting will be used)

post_to_facebook.description: Whether to post these measurements to Facebook (optional; if omitted, the user's default setting will be used)

GetSleepSetFeed.summary: Returns sleep activities for the given user.

UNKNOWN.description: The value of the measured quantity (omitted if not available)

post_to_twitter.description: Whether to post these measurements to Twitter (optional; if omitted, the user's default setting will be used)

post_to_facebook.description: Whether to post these measurements to Facebook (optional; if omitted, the user's default setting will be used)

GetNutritionSetFeed.summary: Returns nutrition activities for the given user.

calories.description: The value of the measured quantity

post_to_twitter.description: Whether to post these measurements to Twitter

post_to_facebook.description: Whether to post these measurements to Facebook

GetWeightSetFeed.summary: Returns weight activities for the given user.

weight.description: The value of the measured quantity in kg

post_to_twitter.description: Whether to post these measurements to Twitter

post_to_facebook.description: Whether to post these measurements to Facebook

GetGeneralMeasurementSetFeed.summary: Returns general measurement activities for the given user.

post_to_twitter.description: Whether to post these measurements to Twitter

post_to_facebook.description: Whether to post these measurements to Facebook

GetDiabetesMeasurementSetFeed.summary: Returns diabetes activities for the given user.

post_to_twitter.description: Whether to post these measurements to Twitter

post_to_facebook.description: Whether to post these measurements to Facebook

GetRecords.summary: Returns records for the given user.

GetFriendFeed.summary: Returns records for the given user.

userID.description: The ID of the user to invite

GetChangeLog.summary: Returns records for the given user.

name.description: The user's full name (omitted if not yet specified)

location.description: The user's geographical location (omitted if not yet specified)

athlete_type.description: One of the following values: Athlete, Runner, Marathoner, Ultra Marathoner, Cyclist, Tri-Athlete, Walker, Hiker, Skier, Snowboarder, Skater, Swimmer, Rower (omitted if not yet specified)

gender.description: One of the following values: M, F (omitted if not yet specified)

birthday.description: The user's birthday (e.g., Sat, 1 Jan 2011 00:00:00) (omitted if not yet specified)

elite.description: true if the user subscribes to RunKeeper Elite, false otherwise

profile.description: The URL of the user's public, human-readable profile on the RunKeeper Web site

small_picture.description: The URI of the small (50×50 pixels) version of the user's profile picture on the RunKeeper Web site (omitted if the user has no such picture)

normal_picture.description: The URI of the small (100×100 pixels) version of the user's profile picture on the RunKeeper Web site (omitted if the user has no such picture)

medium_picture.description: The URI of the small (200×600 pixels) version of the user's profile picture on the RunKeeper Web site (omitted if the user has no such picture)

large_picture.description: The URI of the small (600×1800 pixels) version of the user's profile picture on the RunKeeper Web site (omitted if the user has no such picture)

uri.description: The URI for this measurement set

userID.description: The unique ID for the user

fasting_plasma_glucose_test.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

oral_glucose_tolerance_test.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

random_plasma_glucose_test.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

hemoglobin_a1c.description: The value of the measured quantity in g/dL

insulin.description: The value of the measured quantity in U

c_peptide.description: The value of the measured quantity in ng/mL

triglyceride.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

uri.description: The URI for this measurement set

userID.description: The unique ID for the user

systolic.description: The value of the measured quantity in mmHg

diastolic.description: The value of the measured quantity in mmHg

total_cholesterol.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

hdl.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

ldl.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

vitamin_d.description: The value of the measured quantity in ng/mL

hscrp.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/L

crp.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/L

tsh.description: The value of the measured quantity in mlU/L

uric_acid.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

resting_heartrate.description: The value of the measured quantity in bpm

blood_calcium.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

blood_magnesium.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

creatine_kinase.description: The value of the measured quantity in U/L

blood_vitamin_b12.description: The value of the measured quantity in pg/mL

blood_folic_acid.description: The value of the measured quantity in ng/mL

ferritin.description: The value of the measured quantity in ng/mL

il6.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

testosterone.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

blood_potassium.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

blood_sodium.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg/dL

blood_zinc.description: The value of the measured quantity in mug/dL

blood_chromium.description: The value of the measured quantity in mug/dL

white_cell_count.description: The value of the measured quantity in nmol/muL

start_time.description: The starting time for the activity (e.g., Sat, 1 Jan 2011 00:00:00)

total_calories.description: The total calories burned (omitted if not available)

notes.description: Any notes that the user has associated with the activity (max. 1024 characters; optional)

comments.description: The URI of the comment thread for this activity

uri.description: The URI for this measurement set

userID.description: The unique ID for the user

calories_burned.description: The value of the measured quantity (omitted if not available)

steps.description: The value of the measured quantity (omitted if not available)

uri.description: The URI for this measurement set

userID.description: The unique ID for the user

calories.description: The value of the measured quantity (omitted if not available)

carbohydrates.description: The value of the measured quantity in g (omitted if not available)

fat.description: The value of the measured quantity in g (omitted if not available)

fiber.description: The value of the measured quantity in g (omitted if not available)

protein.description: The value of the measured quantity in g (omitted if not available)

sodium.description: The value of the measured quantity in mg (omitted if not available)

water.description: The value of the measured quantity in fl oz (omitted if not available)

meal.description: The meal, as one of the following values:breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack, other,unspecified

uri.description: The URI for this measurement set

userID.description: The unique ID for the user

total_sleep.description: The value of the measured quantity in min (omitted if not available)

deep.description: The value of the measured quantity in min (omitted if not available)

rem.description: The value of the measured quantity in min (omitted if not available)

light.description: The value of the measured quantity in min (omitted if not available)

awake.description: The value of the measured quantity in min (omitted if not available)

times_woken.description: The value of the measured quantity (omitted if not available)

uri.description: The URI for this measurement set

userID.description: The unique ID for the user

weight.description: The value of the measured quantity in kg (omitted if not available)

free_mass.description: The value of the measured quantity in kg (omitted if not available)

fat_percent.description: The value of the measured quantity (omitted if not available)

mass_weight.description: The value of the measured quantity in kg (omitted if not available)

bmi.description: The value of the measured quantity (omitted if not available)

timestamp.description: The number of seconds since the start of the activity

calories.description: The total calories burned since the start of the activity

userID.description: The unique ID for the user that completed the commented-on activity

timestamp.description: The time at which the comment was posted

userID.description: The unique ID for the user that left the comment

name.description: The display name of the user that left the comment

timestamp.description: The number of seconds since the start of the activity

distance.description: The total distance traveled since the start of the activity, in meters

timestamp.description: The number of seconds since the start of the activity

heart_rate.description: The instantaneous heart rate, in beats per minute

timestamp.description: The number of seconds since the start of the activity

latitude.description: The latitude, in degrees (values increase northward and decrease southward)

longitude.description: The longitude, in degrees (values increase eastward and decrease westward)

thumbnail_uri.description: The URI of the thumbnail version of the image

timestamp.description: The number of seconds since the start of the activity

latitude.description: The latitude, in degrees (values increase northward and decrease southward)

longitude.description: The longitude, in degrees (values increase eastward and decrease westward)

altitude.description: The altitude of the point, in meters

type.description: One of the following values: start, end, gps, pause, resume, manual

activity_type.description: The type of activity, as one of the following values: Running, Cycling, Mountain Biking, Walking, Hiking, Downhill Skiing, Cross-Country Skiing, Snowboarding, Skating, Swimming, Wheelchair, Rowing, Elliptical, Other

stats.description: The statistics for the activity type (empty if no records are available)

stat_type.description: The type of statistic, as one of the following values: BEST_ACTIVITY, BEST_WEEK, LAST_WEEK, THIS_WEEK, BEST_MONTH, LAST_MONTH, THIS_MONTH, OVERALL

date.description: The date of the record (e.g., Sat, 1 Jan 2011 00:00:00)

routine.description: Free-form tag for the routine of which this exercise is a part

sets.description: The sets performed during this exercise

source.description: The name of the application that last modified this measurement set

previous.description: The URI of the previous measurement set for the user (omitted for the oldest measurement set)

next.description: The URI of the next measurement set for the user (omitted for the most-recent measurement set)

nearest_fitness_activity.description: The URI of the fitness activity closest in time to this activity for the user (omitted if no fitness activities have been recorded)

nearest_teammate_fitness_activity.description: The URIs of the fitness activities closest in time to this activity for each friend (empty if no fitness activities have been recorded)

nearest_strength_training_activity.description: The URI of the strength training activity closest in time to this activity for the user (omitted if no strength training activities have been recorded)

nearest_teammate_strength_training_activ.description: The URIs of the strength training activities closest in time to this activity for each friend (empty if no strength training activities have been recorded)

nearest_teammate_background_activities.description: The URIs of the background activities closest in time to this activity for each friend (empty if no background activities have been recorded)

nearest_sleep.description: The URI of the sleep measurement set closest in time to this activity for the user (omitted if no sleep measurements have been taken)

nearest_teammate_sleep.description: The URIs of the sleep measurement sets closest in time to this activity for each friend (empty if no sleep measurements have been taken)

nearest_nutrition.description: The URI of the nutrition measurement sets closest in time to this activity for the user (omitted if no nutrition measurements have been token)

nearest_teammate_nutrition.description: The URIs of the nutrition measurement sets closest in time to this activity for each friend (empty if no nutrition measurements have been token)

nearest_weight.description: The URI of the weight measurement sets closest in time to this activity for the user (omitted if no weight measurements have been token)

nearest_teammate_weight.description: The URIs of the weight measurement sets closest in time to this activity for each friend (empty if no weight measurements have been token)

nearest_general_measurement.description: The URI of the general measurement set measurement closest in time to this activity for the user (omitted if no general measurements have been token)

nearest_teammate_general_measurements.description: The URIs of the general measurement sets closest in time to this activity for each friend (empty if no general measurements have been token)

nearest_diabetes.description: The URI of the diabetes measurement sets closest in time to this activity for the user (omitted if no diabetes measurements have been token)

nearest_teammate_diabetes.description: The URIs of the diabetes measurement sets closest in time to this activity for each friend (empty if no diabetes measurements have been token)
